          	def admin_has_dept

            # allows super admins to reset modulect completely by resetting all the database tables/models
        
      52.

          1
          
            def reset_modulect
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
              password_received = params[:dwp]
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
              if current_user.is_password?(password_received)
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
          
        
      56.

                Comment.destroy_all

      75.

                app_settings.update_attributes(:offline_message => "", :allow_new_registration => true, :tag_percentage_match => 60.0, :disable_new_reviews => false, :disable_all_reviews => false)
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
          
        
      78. 
      
        
    78.

      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                User.all.each do |user|
        
      80.

                	user.update_attributes(:faculty_id => nil, :department_id => nil, :course_id => nil)
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          
          
                end
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
          
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
                flash[:success] = "Modulect has succesfully been reset."
        
      84.

              else
        
      85.

               	flash[:error] = "The password you entered was incorrect."

      27.

              # destroys a course as well as assoicated year strucutres and groups, as well as clearing pathway logs

              def destroy
        
      141. 
      
        
    141. 
          1
          
                @course = Course.find(params[:id])
        
      142. 
      
        
    142. 
          
          
          
        
      143.

          1

      148. 
      
        
    148. 
          1

          1

      155.

      157.

              # handles the bulk deletion of courses, deleting year structures, groups and any logs which may reference this course
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          1
          
              def bulk_delete
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          1
          
                course_ids_string = params[:ids]
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          1
          
                course_ids = eval(course_ids_string)
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
          
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          1
          
                course_ids.each do |id|
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          1
          
                  course = Course.find(id.to_i)
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          1
          
                    if !course.nil?
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          1
          
                      course.year_structures.each do |year_structure|
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
                        Group.where(year_structure_id: year_structure.id).destroy_all
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
                      end
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          1
          
                      YearStructure.where(course_id: course.id).destroy_all
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          1
          
                      pathway_search_logs = PathwaySearchLog.all.where(:course_id => course.id)
        
      181. 
      
        
    181. 
          1
          
                        if pathway_search_logs.size >0
        
      182. 
      
        
    182. 
          
          
                          pathway_search_logs.each do |log|
        
      183. 
      
        
    183. 
          
          
                            log.destroy
        
      184. 
      
        
    184. 
          
          
                          end
        
      185. 
      
        
    185. 
          
          
                      end 
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          1
          
                      Pathway.where(course_id: course.id).destroy_all
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          1
          
                      SuggestedPathway.where(course_id: course.id).destroy_all
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          1
          
                      course.destroy
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          
          
                    end
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
                end
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
          
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          1
          
                head :no_content
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
              end
        
      194.

      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
              # handles the clone bulk action
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          1
          
              def clone
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          1
          
                course_ids_string = params[:ids]
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          1
          
                deep_clone_courses_with_ids(course_ids_string)
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          1
          
                head :no_content
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
              end
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
          
        
      202. 
      
        
    202. 
          
          
          
        
      203. 
      
        
    203.

              private

              def clone 
        
      163.

          1
          
                department_ids_string = params[:ids]

          1
          
                department_ids = eval(department_ids_string)

    168. 
          
          
                  
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          1
          
                    if !department.nil?
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          1
          
                      if Department.exists?(name: department.name + "-CLONE")
        
      171. 
      
        
    171.

      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                      else
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          1

      174.

          1

              def check_valid_update

            def like
        
      62. 
      
        
    62.

      65.

      66.

    67.

      69.

      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                helpful = true
        
      71. 
      
        
    71.

              if @comment.reported_users.include? @user
        
      116. 
      
        
    116. 
          
          
                @comment.reported_users.delete @user
        
      117. 
      
        
    117. 
          
          
                reported = false
        
      118. 
      
        
    118. 
          
          
              else
        
      119. 
      
        
    119. 
          
          
                @comment.reported_users << @user
        
      120. 
      
        
    120. 
          
          
                reported = true
        
      121. 
      
        
    121. 
          
          
              end
        
      122. 
      
        
    122. 
          
          
          
        
      123. 
      
        
    123. 
          
          
              data = {reported: reported}
        
      124. 
      
        
    124. 
          
          
              render json: data
        
      125. 
      
        
    125. 
          
          
          
        
      126. 
      
        
    126. 
          
          
            end
        
      127. 
      
        
    127. 
          
          
          
        
      128.

            # allows an admin user to unflag a comment

              @comment = Comment.find(params[:comment_id])

    131. 
          
          
          
        
      132.

              @comment.reported_users.clear
        
      133.

      134.

            def update

            def upload_course(new_record, uploader)
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          5
          
              creations = 0
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          5
          
              updates = 0
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
          
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          5
          
              csv_course = find_course_from_database(new_record)

    10. 
          
          
          
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
              # If departments cell is left empty in csv then turn it into empty string
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
              # So that nothing is called on nil
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          5
          
              new_record_departments = new_record['departments']
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          5
          
              if new_record_departments.nil?
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
                new_record_departments = ''
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
              end
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
              # Department admin restrictions
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          5
          
              if invalid_course_create?(csv_course, new_record_departments, uploader)
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = "Failed to create course #{new_record['name']}, #{new_record['year']}: Course not linked to your department"
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          5
          
              elsif invalid_course_update?(csv_course, new_record_departments, uploader)

      24. 
      
        
    24.

      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          5
          
                if csv_course.blank?
        
      26.

          3

    27. 
          3
          
                  course_duration_in_years_pre_update = 0

          3
          
                  creations += 1

    29. 
          
          
                else

          2

    31. 
          2

    32. 
          2

      33. 
      
        
    33.

      35.

      37.

            def invalid_course_create?(csv_course, new_record_departments, uploader)
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
              # Prevent creating courses that don't belong to their department
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          5
          
              dept_admin_invalid_request = is_not_super_admin?(uploader) && !new_record_departments.include?(uploader.department.name)
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          5
          
              !being_updated?(csv_course) && dept_admin_invalid_request
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
            end
        
      54.

      55.

          1
          
            def invalid_course_update?(csv_course, new_record_departments, uploader)
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
              # Prevent updating courses not in their department and prevent un-linking their own dept from course
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          5
          
              dept_admin_invalid_request = is_not_super_admin?(uploader) && (!csv_course.departments.include?(uploader.department) || !new_record_departments.include?(uploader.department.name))
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          5
          
              being_updated?(csv_course) && dept_admin_invalid_request
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
            end
        
      60.

              new_course

            def try_to_update_course(updated_course, new_record)

            def parse_csv_and_display_notice(csv_text, resource_name, resource_header, uploader)
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          
          
              # Replace characters not defined by utf-8
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          11
          
              csv_text = csv_text.encode(invalid: :replace, undef: :replace, replace: '')
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          11
          
              parsed_csv = CSV.parse(csv_text, headers: true)
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
              # Retrieve the header of the uploaded CSV to determine if valid
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          11
          
              uploaded_header = parsed_csv.headers
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
          
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          11
          
              if parsed_csv.length == 0
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = 'Upload Failed: No records found. CSV is empty'
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          11
          
              elsif uploaded_header != resource_header
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
                # In this case the user didn't upload the resource the server was expecting
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
                flash[:error] = 'Upload Failed: Please ensure the CSV header matches the template file'
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
              else
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                # Depending on the resource, call the appropriate upload method
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                # And retrieve the number of creations and updates that were made
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          11
          
                if resource_name == 'departments'
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          2
          
                  creations, updates = upload_departments(parsed_csv)
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          9
          
                elsif resource_name == 'faculties'
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          3
          
                  creations, updates = upload_faculties(parsed_csv)
        
      25. 
      
        
    25. 
          6
          
                elsif resource_name == 'courses'
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          4
          
                  creations, updates = upload_courses(parsed_csv, uploader)
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          2
          
                elsif resource_name == 'uni_modules'
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          2

      29. 
      
        
    29.

      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
                  flash[:notice] = 'Resource not recognized'

    31.

      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
                end
        
      33. 
      
        
    33.

              end
        
      35.

            def upload_departments(parsed_csv)
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          2
          
              creations, updates = 0, 0
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          2
          
              parsed_csv.each do |row|
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          2
          
                csv_department = row.to_hash
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
                # If a department is found to be linked to a Faulty that doesn't exist
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          2
          
                if Faculty.where(name: row.to_hash['faculty_name']).first.nil?
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          1
          
                  flash[:error] = "No Faculty with name: #{row.to_hash['faculty_name']} found.
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
                                        Department with name: #{row.to_hash['name']} has not been created"
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
                else
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
                  # Add the faculty ID from name to the hash, exclude the faculty name from the hash
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
                  # The hash now includes all the required attributes for create/update
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          1
          
                  csv_department['faculty_id'] = Faculty.where(name: row.to_hash['faculty_name']).first.id
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          1
          
                  csv_department = csv_department.except('faculty_name')
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          1
          
                  if Department.find_by_name(csv_department['name']).nil?
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
                    # If department doesn't exist -> create
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          1
          
                    Department.create(csv_department).errors.full_messages.each { |message| flash[:error] = "Creation failed: #{message}" }
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          1
          
                    creations += 1
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
                  else
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
                    # If department doesn't exist -> update
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
                    Department.update(csv_department)
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                    updates += 1
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                  end
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                end
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
              end
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          2
          
              return creations, updates
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
            end

            def upload_faculties(parsed_csv)
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          3
          
              creations, updates = 0, 0
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          3
          
              parsed_csv.each do |row|
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          3
          
                csv_faculty = row.to_hash
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          3
          
                if csv_faculty['name'].nil?
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
                  flash[:error] = 'Creation failed: Name cannot be left blank'
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
                else
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
                  # If faculty doesn't exist -> create
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          3
          
                  if Faculty.find_by_name(csv_faculty['name']).nil?
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          3
          
                    faculty_entry = Faculty.create(csv_faculty.except('departments'))
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          3
          
                    creations += 1
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
                  else
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
                    # If faculty doesn't exist then find existing faculty object
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
                    faculty_entry = Faculty.find_by_name(csv_faculty['name'])
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
                    updates += 1
        
      79. 
      
        
    79. 
          
          
                  end
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
                  # This will happen on both create and update
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          3
          
                  faculty_entry.departments= []
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          3
          
                  split_multi_association_field(csv_faculty['departments']).each do |dept_name|
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          5
          
                    department_found = Department.find_by_name(dept_name)
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          5
          
                    if department_found.nil?
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                      # If department entered doesn't already exist, create new dept with faculty as this faculty
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          2
          
                      Department.create(name: dept_name, faculty_id: faculty_entry.id)
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
                    else
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                      # If department exists, update faculty id of found dept to this faculty
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          3
          
                      department_found.update(faculty_id: faculty_entry.id)
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
                    end
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
                  end
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
                end
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
              end
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          3
          
              return creations, updates
        
      95. 
      
        
    95. 
          
          
            end
        
      96.

      97.

          1
          
            def upload_courses(parsed_csv, uploader)
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          4
          
              creations, updates = 0, 0
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          4

            def invalid_module_create?(csv_module, new_record, uploader)
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
              # Prevent creating modules that don't belong to their department
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          4
          
               dept_admin_invalid_request = is_not_super_admin?(uploader)  && !new_record['departments'].include?(uploader.department.name)
        
      41.

          4

            def invalid_module_update?(csv_module, new_record, uploader)
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
              # Prevent updating modules not in their department and prevent un-linking their own dept from module

          4

            def should_save?(csv_module)

    149. 
          
          
          # Calling csv_module#valid? will override the already existent errors.
        
      150. 
      
        
    150. 
          
          
          # Make sure that valid_base_attributes? is called last so no errors are overridden.
        
      151.

          1
          
            def invalid_module?(csv_module)
        
      152. 
      
        
    152. 
          
          
              !csv_module.errors.empty? || !valid_associations?(csv_module) || !valid_base_attributes?(csv_module)
        
      153.

            end

            def valid_base_attributes?(record)

              record.valid?

            def valid_associations?(csv_module)
        
      160. 
      
        
    160. 
          
          
              valid_module = false
        
      161. 
      
        
    161. 
          
          
              if csv_module.tags.empty?
        
      162. 
      
        
    162. 
          
          
                csv_module.errors[:base] << "At least a Tag must be given"
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
              elsif csv_module.departments.empty?
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
                csv_module.errors[:base] << "At least a Department must be given"
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
              else
        
      166. 
      
        
    166. 
          
          
                valid_module = true
        
      167. 
      
        
    167. 
          
          
              end
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          
          
          
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
              valid_module
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
            end

            def display_errors(csv_module)
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
              update_error = "Update Failed: "
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
              csv_module.errors.full_messages.each do |error|
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
                update_error += error + '; '
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
              end
        
      177. 
      
        
    177.

            def convert_semester_to_enum(semester)
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          4
          
              case semester
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
                when '1 or 2'
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
                  0
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
                when '1'
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          3
          
                  1
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
                when '2'
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          1
          
                  2
        
      200. 
      
        
    200. 
          
          
                else
        
      201. 
      
        
    201. 
          
          
                  3
        
      202. 
      
        
    202.

            def being_updated?(the_module)
        
      206.

              !the_module.nil?

            def is_not_super_admin?(uploader)
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
              uploader.user_level != 'super_admin_access'

            # A simple helper method which sets the page title on admin
        
      5. 
      
        
    5. 
          1
          
            def full_title_admin(page_title = '')
        
      6. 
      
        
    6. 
          34
          
                base_title = "Modulect"
        
      7. 
      
        
    7. 
          34
          
                if page_title.empty?
        
      8. 
      
        
    8. 
          
          
                 "Admin | " + base_title
        
      9. 
      
        
    9. 
          
          
                else
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          34
          
                  page_title + " - Admin | " + base_title
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          
          
                end
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
            end
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          
          
              # sort_by is like "name" for unimodule
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
              # order is either asc or desc (lowercase)
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          1
          
              def sort(table_name, list, sort_by, order, per_page, default)
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          
          
          
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
                if table_name.has_attribute?(sort_by) && (order == "asc" || order == "desc")
        
      19. 
      
        
    19. 
          
          
                 list = list.sort_by{|item| item[sort_by].to_s.downcase}
        
      20. 
      
        
    20. 
          
          
                  if order == "desc"
        
      21. 
      
        
    21. 
          
          
                    list = list.reverse
        
      22. 
      
        
    22. 
          
          
                  end
        
      23. 
      
        
    23. 
          
          
                  list 
        
      24. 
      
        
    24. 
          
          
                else
        
      25.

          	def is_number? string

          	def format_output_data(input_hash, sort_by, number_to_show)
        
      10. 
      
        
    10. 
          
          
          		# sort alphabetically
        
      11. 
      
        
    11. 
          30
          
          		input_hash = input_hash.sort_by {|_key, value| _key}
        
      12. 
      
        
    12. 
          
          
          
        
      13. 
      
        
    13. 
          
          
          		# then sort based on request
        
      14. 
      
        
    14. 
          14
          
          		if sort_by == "least"
        
      15. 
      
        
    15. 
          
          
          			input_hash = input_hash.sort_by {|_key, value| value}
        
      16. 
      
        
    16. 
          
          
          		else
        
      17. 
      
        
    17. 
          30
          
          			input_hash = input_hash.sort_by {|_key, value| value}.reverse
        
      18. 
      
        
    18. 
          
          
          		end
        
      19. 
      
        
    19.

          		end

          		input_hash

          	end

          	# get percentage difference
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
          	# if negative output, then a decrease else increase
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          1
          
          	def percentage_difference(new_value, old_value)
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          8
          
          		increase = new_value.to_f - old_value.to_f
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          8
          
          		percentage_change = (increase / old_value.to_f) * 100
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          8
          
          		if percentage_change.nan?
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          6
          
          			0.round(2)
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          		else 
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          2
          
          			percentage_change.round(2)
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          		end
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          	end
        
      37.

      38.

          	# get the start date of the desired period of time
        
      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          1
          
          	def get_start_desired_period(amount_time, time_period, from_date)
        
      81. 
      
        
    81. 
          48
          
          		if time_period == "hour"
        
      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
          			from_date - amount_time.hour
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          48
          
          		elsif time_period == "day"
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
          			from_date - amount_time.day
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          48
          
          		elsif time_period == "week"
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
          			from_date - amount_time.week
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          48
          
          		elsif time_period == "month"
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          48
          
          			from_date - amount_time.month
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
          		elsif time_period == "year"
        
      90. 
      
        
    90. 
          
          
          			from_date - amount_time.year
        
      91. 
      
        
    91. 
          
          
          		elsif time_period == "all_time"
        
      92. 
      
        
    92. 
          
          
          			from_date - 20.year
        
      93. 
      
        
    93. 
          
          
          		end
        
      94. 
      
        
    94. 
          
          
          	end

          	# check whether the input (created_at) falls in the desired period of time
        
      97. 
      
        
    97. 
          1
          
          	def date_check(amount_time, time_period, from_date, created_at)
        
      98. 
      
        
    98. 
          40
          
          		created_at >= get_start_desired_period(amount_time, time_period, from_date) && created_at < from_date
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
          	end

    185. 
          4
          
          			if user.department_id.present?
        
      186. 
      
        
    186. 
          4
          
          				department = Department.find(user.department_id)
        
      187. 
      
        
    187. 
          4
          
          				if !user.last_login_time.nil? && date_check(amount_time, time_period, from_date, user.last_login_time)
        
      188. 
      
        
    188. 
          4
          
          					if departments_data.key?(department)
        
      189. 
      
        
    189. 
          2
          
          						departments_data[department] += 1
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          
          
          					else
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          2
          
          						departments_data[department] = 1
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          
          
          					end	
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
          				end
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          
          
          			end
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          
          
          		end
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          
          
          
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          2
          
          		format_output_data(departments_data, sort_by, number_to_show)
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
          
        
      199. 
      
        
    199. 
          
          
          	end
        
      200.

          	# most/least active department (admin-wise)

          	def get_active_departments_admin_wise(users, amount_time, time_period, from_date, sort_by, number_to_show)
        
      203.

          		departments_data = Hash.new
        
      204.

          		users =  User.all.select{ |user| user.user_level == "department_admin_access"}

      207.

          			department = Department.find(user.department_id)
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
          			if !user.last_login_time.nil? && date_check(amount_time, time_period, from_date, user.last_login_time)
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
          				if departments_data.key?(department)
        
      210. 
      
        
    210.

      211.

      212.

          	def get_active_user(users, amount_time, time_period, from_date, sort_by, number_to_show)
        
      223. 
      
        
    223. 
          2
          
          		users_data = Hash.new
        
      224.

          2
          
          		SavedModule.all.each do |record|
        
      226.

          2
          
          			user = User.find(record.user_id)
        
      227. 
      
        
    227. 
          2
          
          			if users.include?(user) && date_check(amount_time, time_period, from_date, record.created_at)
        
      228. 
      
        
    228. 
          2
          
          				if users_data.key?(user)

          					users_data[user] += 1
        
      230.

          	def get_saved_modules(uni_modules, users, amount_time, time_period, from_date, sort_by, number_to_show)

          2
          
          		uni_modules_data = Hash.new
        
      242.

          2
          
          		SavedModule.all.each do |record|

          2
          
          			user = User.find(record.user_id)
        
      245. 
      
        
    245. 
          2
          
          			uni_module = UniModule.find(record.uni_module_id)
        
      246. 
      
        
    246. 
          2
          
          			if users.include?(user) && date_check(amount_time, time_period, from_date, record.created_at)
        
      247. 
      
        
    247. 
          2
          
          				if uni_modules_data.key?(uni_module)

      249. 
      
        
    249. 
          
          
          				else
        
      250.

          2

          				end

          	def get_visited_modules(uni_modules, amount_time, time_period, from_date, sort_by, number_to_show)

          4

          4

          4

          	# get modules most frequently chosen with a selected module
        
      276. 
      
        
    276. 
          1
          
          	def get_modules_chosen_with(uni_module_id, department_id, course_id, amount_time, time_period, from_date, sort_by, number_to_show)
        
      277. 
      
        
    277. 
          
          
          		uni_modules_data = Hash.new
        
      278. 
      
        
    278. 
          
          
          		pathway_search_log_first_data = PathwaySearchLog.where('first_mod_id = ?', uni_module_id)
        
      279. 
      
        
    279. 
          
          
          		pathway_search_log_second_data = PathwaySearchLog.where('second_mod_id = ?', uni_module_id)
        
      280. 
      
        
    280. 
          
          
              pathway_search_log_first_data.each do |log|
        
      281. 
      
        
    281. 
          
          
                if UniModule.find(log.second_mod_id)
        
      282. 
      
        
    282. 
          
          
                  uni_module = UniModule.find(log.second_mod_id)
        
      283. 
      
        
    283. 
          
          
                  if date_check(amount_time, time_period, from_date, log.created_at)
        
      284. 
      
        
    284. 
          
          
                    uni_modules_data[uni_module] = log.counter
        
      285. 
      
        
    285. 
          
          
                  end
        
      286. 
      
        
    286. 
          
          
                end
        
      287. 
      
        
    287. 
          
          
              end
        
      288. 
      
        
    288. 
          
          
          
        
      289. 
      
        
    289. 
          
          
              pathway_search_log_second_data.each do |log|
        
      290. 
      
        
    290. 
          
          
                if UniModule.find(log.first_mod_id)
        
      291. 
      
        
    291. 
          
          
                  uni_module = UniModule.find(log.first_mod_id)
        
      292. 
      
        
    292. 
          
          
                  if date_check(amount_time, time_period, from_date, log.created_at)
        
      293. 
      
        
    293. 
          
          
                    uni_modules_data[uni_module] = log.counter
        
      294. 
      
        
    294. 
          
          
                  end
        
      295. 
      
        
    295. 
          
          
                end
        
      296. 
      
        
    296. 
          
          
              end
        
      297. 
      
        
    297. 
          
          
          
        
      298. 
      
        
    298. 
          
          
              format_output_data(uni_modules_data, sort_by, number_to_show)
        
      299. 
      
        
    299. 
          
          
          
        
      300. 
      
        
    300. 
          
          
              p format_output_data(uni_modules_data, sort_by, number_to_show)
        
      301. 
      
        
    301. 
          
          
            end
        
      302.

    303. 
          
          
          	# most/least clicked (trending) tags
        
      304. 
      
        
    304. 
          1
          
          	def get_clicked_tags(tags, amount_time, time_period, from_date, sort_by, number_to_show, type_of_tag)
        
      305. 
      
        
    305. 
          6
          
          		all_tags = tags
        
      306. 
      
        
    306. 
          
          
          
        
      307. 
      
        
    307. 
          6
          
          		if type_of_tag == 'career'
        
      308. 
      
        
    308. 
          24
          
          			all_tags = all_tags.select{ |tag| tag.type == 'CareerTag' }
        
      309. 
      
        
    309. 
          4
          
          		elsif  type_of_tag == 'interest'
        
      310. 
      
        
    310. 
          24
          
          			all_tags = all_tags.select{ |tag| tag.type == 'InterestTag' }
        
      311. 
      
        
    311. 
          
          
          		end
        
      312. 
      
        
    312. 
          
          
          		
        
      313. 
      
        
    313. 
          
          
          
        
      314. 
      
        
    314. 
          6
          
          		tags_data = Hash.new
        
      315. 
      
        
    315. 
          6
          
          		TagLog.all.each do |log|
        
      316. 
      
        
    316. 
          
          
          			if (tag = Tag.find(log.tag_id))
        
      317. 
      
        
    317. 
          
          
          				if all_tags.include?(tag) && date_check(amount_time, time_period, from_date, log.created_at)
        
      318. 
      
        
    318. 
          
          
          						tags_data[tag] = log.counter
        
      319. 
      
        
    319. 
          
          
          				end
        
      320. 
      
        
    320. 
          
          
          			end
        
      321. 
      
        
    321. 
          
          
          		end
        
      322. 
      
        
    322. 
          
          
          
        
      323. 
      
        
    323. 
          
          
          		# then sort based on request
        
      324. 
      
        
    324. 
          6
          
          		if sort_by == "least"
        
      325. 
      
        
    325. 
          
          
          			tags_data = tags_data.sort_by {|_key, value| value}
        
      326. 
      
        
    326. 
          
          
          		else
        
      327. 
      
        
    327. 
          6
          
          			tags_data = tags_data.sort_by {|_key, value| value}.reverse
        
      328. 
      
        
    328. 
          
          
          		end
        
      329. 
      
        
    329. 
          
          
          
        
      330. 
      
        
    330. 
          6
          
          		if is_number?(number_to_show)
        
      331. 
      
        
    331. 
          6
          
          			tags_data = tags_data.first(number_to_show)
        
      332. 
      
        
    332. 
          
          
          		end
        
      333. 
      
        
    333. 
          6
          
          		tags_data
        
      334. 
      
        
    334. 
          
          
          
        
      335. 
      
        
    335. 
          
          
          	end
        
      336. 
      
        
    336. 
          
          
          
        
      337. 
      
        
    337. 
          
          
          
        
      338. 
      
        
    338. 
          
          
          	# get number of visitors (both logged in and non-logged in)
        
      339. 
      
        
    339. 
          1
          
          	def get_number_visitors(department_id, amount_time, time_period, from_date)
        
      340. 
      
        
    340. 
          
          
          
        
      341. 
      
        
    341. 
          6
          
          		if department_id != 'any' && is_number?(department_id) && !Department.find(department_id.to_i).nil?
        
      342. 
      
        
    342. 
          
          
          			logs = VisitorLog.all.select{|log| log.department_id == department_id.to_i}
        
      343. 
      
        
    343. 
          
          
          		else
        
      344. 
      
        
    344. 
          6
          
          			logs = VisitorLog.all
        
      345. 
      
        
    345. 
          
          
          		end
        
      346. 
      
        
    346. 
          
          
          
        
      347. 
      
        
    347. 
          
          
          
        
      348. 
      
        
    348. 
          6
          
          		total_visitors = 0
        
      349. 
      
        
    349. 
          
          
          		
        
      350. 
      
        
    350. 
          6
          
          		logs.each do |log|
        
      351. 
      
        
    351. 
          12
          
          			if date_check(amount_time, time_period, from_date, log.created_at)
        
      352. 
      
        
    352. 
          8
          
          				total_visitors += 1
        
      353. 
      
        
    353. 
          
          
          			end
        
      354. 
      
        
    354. 
          
          
          		end
        
      355. 
      
        
    355. 
          
          
          
        
      356. 
      
        
    356. 
          6
          
          		total_visitors
        
      357. 
      
        
    357. 
          
          
          
        
      358. 
      
        
    358. 
          
          
          	end
        
      359. 
      
        
    359. 
          
          
          
        
      360. 
      
        
    360. 
          
          
          	# get number of logged in users
        
      361. 
      
        
    361. 
          1
          
          	def get_number_logged_in_users(department_id, amount_time, time_period, from_date)
        
      362. 
      
        
    362. 
          
          
          		
        
      363. 
      
        
    363. 
          2
          
          		if department_id != 'any' && is_number?(department_id) && !Department.find(department_id.to_i).nil?
        
      364. 
      
        
    364. 
          
          
          			logs = VisitorLog.all.select{|log| log.department_id == department_id.to_i}
        
      365. 
      
        
    365. 
          
          
          		else
        
      366. 
      
        
    366. 
          2
          
          			logs = VisitorLog.all
        
      367. 
      
        
    367. 
          
          
          		end
        
      368. 
      
        
    368. 
          
          
          
        
      369. 
      
        
    369. 
          
          
          
        
      370. 
      
        
    370. 
          2
          
          		total_visitors = 0
        
      371. 
      
        
    371. 
          
          
          		
        
      372. 
      
        
    372. 
          2
          
          		logs.each do |log|
        
      373. 
      
        
    373. 
          4
          
          			if date_check(amount_time, time_period, from_date, log.created_at) && log.logged_in
        
      374. 
      
        
    374. 
          2
          
          				total_visitors += 1
        
      375. 
      
        
    375. 
          
          
          			end
        
      376. 
      
        
    376. 
          
          
          		end
        
      377. 
      
        
    377. 
          
          
          
        
      378. 
      
        
    378. 
          2
          
          		total_visitors
        
      379. 
      
        
    379. 
          
          
          	end
        
      380. 
      
        
    380. 
          
          
          
        
      381. 
      
        
    381. 
          1
          
            def get_login_analytics(department_id, amount_time, time_period, from_date)
        
      382. 
      
        
    382. 
          2
          
              data = Hash.new
        
      383. 
      
        
    383. 
          2
          
              logged_in = get_number_logged_in_users(department_id, amount_time, time_period, from_date)
        
      384. 
      
        
    384. 
          2
          
              not_logged_in = get_number_visitors(department_id, amount_time, time_period, from_date) - logged_in
        
      385. 
      
        
    385. 
          
          
          
        
      386. 
      
        
    386. 
          2
          
              data['Logged In'] = logged_in
        
      387. 
      
        
    387. 
          2
          
              data['Not Logged In'] = not_logged_in
        
      388. 
      
        
    388. 
          
          
          
        
      389. 
      
        
    389. 
          2
          
              data
        
      390. 
      
        
    390. 
          
          
            end
        
      391. 
      
        
    391. 
          
          
          
        
      392. 
      
        
    392. 
          
          
          	# get device usage
        
      393. 
      
        
    393. 
          1
          
          	def get_device_usage(department_id, amount_time, time_period, from_date)
        
      394. 
      
        
    394. 
          
          
          		
        
      395. 
      
        
    395. 
          2
          
          		if department_id != 'any' && is_number?(department_id) && !Department.find(department_id.to_i).nil?
        
      396. 
      
        
    396. 
          
          
          			logs = VisitorLog.all.select{|log| log.department_id == department_id.to_i}
        
      397. 
      
        
    397. 
          
          
          		else
        
      398. 
      
        
    398. 
          2
          
          			logs = VisitorLog.all
        
      399. 
      
        
    399. 
          
          
          		end
        
      400. 
      
        
    400. 
          
          
          
        
      401. 
      
        
    401. 
          
          
          
        
      402. 
      
        
    402. 
          2
          
          		devices = Hash.new
        
      403. 
      
        
    403. 
          
          
          		
        
      404. 
      
        
    404. 
          2
          
          		logs.each do |log|
        
      405. 
      
        
    405. 
          4
          
          			if  date_check(amount_time, time_period, from_date, log.created_at)
        
      406. 
      
        
    406. 
          4
          
          				if devices.key?(log.device_type)
        
      407. 
      
        
    407. 
          2
          
          					devices[log.device_type] += 1
        
      408. 
      
        
    408. 
          
          
          				else
        
      409. 
      
        
    409. 
          2
          
          					devices[log.device_type] = 1
        
      410. 
      
        
    410. 
          
          
          				end
        
      411. 
      
        
    411. 
          
          
          			end
        
      412. 
      
        
    412. 
          
          
          		end
        
      413. 
      
        
    413. 
          
          
          
        
      414. 
      
        
    414. 
          2
          
          		devices
        
      415. 
      
        
    415. 
          
          
          
        
      416. 
      
        
    416. 
          
          
          	end
        
      417. 
      
        
    417. 
          
          
          
        
      418. 
      
        
    418. 
          
          
          	# get number quick searches
        
      419. 
      
        
    419. 
          1
          
          	def get_number_quick_searches(department_id, amount_time, time_period, from_date)
        
      420. 
      
        
    420. 
          4
          
          		if department_id != 'any' && is_number?(department_id) && !Department.find(department_id.to_i).nil?
        
      421. 
      
        
    421. 
          
          
          			logs = SearchLog.all.select{ |log| log.department_id == department_id.to_i && log.search_type == 'quick' }
        
      422. 
      
        
    422. 
          
          
          		else
        
      423. 
      
        
    423. 
          4
          
          			logs = SearchLog.all.select{ |log| log.search_type == 'quick' }
        
      424. 
      
        
    424. 
          
          
          		end
        
      425. 
      
        
    425. 
          
          
          
        
      426. 
      
        
    426.

          		total_searches = 0

          			if  date_check(amount_time, time_period, from_date, log.created_at)
        
      431.

          	def get_search_lists(department_id, type, amount_time, time_period, from_date)

    481. 
          6
          
          		if department_id != 'any' && is_number?(department_id) && !Department.find(department_id.to_i).nil?
        
      482.

      483. 
      
        
    483.

      484. 
      
        
    484.

      486.

      487.

          	# e.g. 17:00 18:00 19:00 20:00 21:00 22:00 23:00 00:00 01:00 02:00 03:00 04:00 05:00 06:00 07:00 08:00 09:00 10:00 11:00 12:00 13:00 14:00 15:00 16:00 17:00

      492.

          	# March ('16) April ('16) May ('16) June ('16) July ('16) August ('16) September ('16) October ('16) November ('16) December ('16) January ('17) February ('17) March ('17) 2012 2013 2014 2015 2016 2017
        
      493. 
      
        
    493. 
          1
          
          	def get_list_of_time_periods(time_period)
        
      494. 
      
        
    494. 
          10
          
          		toReturn = []
        
      495. 
      
        
    495. 
          10
          
          		if time_period == 'day'
        
      496. 
      
        
    496. 
          
          
          			24.downto(0) do |i|
        
      497. 
      
        
    497. 
          
          
          				toReturn << i.hours.ago.strftime('%a %d %H:00')
        
      498. 
      
        
    498. 
          
          
          			end
        
      499. 
      
        
    499. 
          10
          
          		elsif time_period == 'week'
        
      500. 
      
        
    500. 
          
          
          			7.downto(0) do |i|
        
      501. 
      
        
    501. 
          
          
          				toReturn << i.days.ago.strftime('%A %d')
        
      502. 
      
        
    502. 
          
          
          			end
        
      503. 
      
        
    503. 
          10
          
          		elsif  time_period == 'month'
        
      504. 
      
        
    504. 
          10
          
          			31.downto(0) do |i|
        
      505. 
      
        
    505. 
          320
          
          				toReturn << i.days.ago.strftime('%b %d')
        
      506. 
      
        
    506. 
          
          
          			end
        
      507. 
      
        
    507. 
          
          
          		elsif  time_period == 'year'
        
      508. 
      
        
    508. 
          
          
          			12.downto(0) do |i|
        
      509. 
      
        
    509. 
          
          
          				toReturn << i.months.ago.strftime("%B ('%y)")
        
      510. 
      
        
    510. 
          
          
          			end
        
      511. 
      
        
    511. 
          
          
          		elsif time_period == 'all_time'
        
      512. 
      
        
    512. 
          
          
          			3.downto(0) do |i|
        
      513. 
      
        
    513. 
          
          
          				toReturn << i.years.ago.strftime('%Y')
        
      514. 
      
        
    514. 
          
          
          			end		
        
      515. 
      
        
    515. 
          
          
          		end
        
      516. 
      
        
    516. 
          
          
          
        
      517. 
      
        
    517. 
          10
          
          		toReturn
        
      518. 
      
        
    518. 
          
          
          	end
        
      519. 
      
        
    519. 
          
          
          
        
      520. 
      
        
    520. 
          
          
          	# attaches search log date to atime period by normalising both hashes and comparing the different time periods
        
      521. 
      
        
    521. 
          1
          
          	def attach_search_log_data_to_time_period(data_log, time_period)
        
      522. 
      
        
    522. 
          
          
          
        
      523. 
      
        
    523. 
          6
          
          		data_with_time = Hash.new
        
      524. 
      
        
    524. 
          
          
          
        
      525. 
      
        
    525. 
          6
          
          		get_list_of_time_periods(time_period).each do |time|
        
      526. 
      
        
    526. 
          192
          
          			data_with_time[time] = 0
        
      527. 
      
        
    527. 
          
          
          		end
        
      528. 
      
        
    528. 
          
          
          
        
      529. 
      
        
    529. 
          6
          
          		if time_period == 'day'
        
      530. 
      
        
    530. 
          
          
          			data_log.each do |log|
        
      531. 
      
        
    531. 
          
          
          				hour = log.created_at.strftime('%a %d %H:00')
        
      532. 
      
        
    532. 
          
          
          				data_with_time[hour] = data_with_time[hour] + log.counter
        
      533. 
      
        
    533. 
          
          
          			end
        
      534. 
      
        
    534. 
          6
          
          		elsif time_period == 'week'
        
      535. 
      
        
    535. 
          
          
          			data_log.each do |log|
        
      536. 
      
        
    536. 
          
          
          				day = log.created_at.strftime('%A %d')
        
      537. 
      
        
    537. 
          
          
          				data_with_time[day] = data_with_time[day] + log.counter
        
      538. 
      
        
    538. 
          
          
          			end
        
      539. 
      
        
    539. 
          6
          
          		elsif  time_period == 'month'
        
      540. 
      
        
    540. 
          6
          
          			data_log.each do |log|
        
      541. 
      
        
    541. 
          
          
          				day = log.created_at.strftime('%b %d')
        
      542. 
      
        
    542. 
          
          
          				data_with_time[day] = data_with_time[day] + log.counter
        
      543. 
      
        
    543. 
          
          
          			end
        
      544. 
      
        
    544. 
          
          
          		elsif  time_period == 'year'
        
      545. 
      
        
    545. 
          
          
          			data_log.each do |log|
        
      546. 
      
        
    546. 
          
          
          				month = log.created_at.strftime("%B ('%y)")
        
      547. 
      
        
    547. 
          
          
          				data_with_time[month] = data_with_time[month] + log.counter
        
      548. 
      
        
    548. 
          
          
          			end
        
      549. 
      
        
    549. 
          
          
          		elsif time_period == 'all_time'
        
      550. 
      
        
    550. 
          
          
          			data_log.each do |log|
        
      551. 
      
        
    551. 
          
          
          				year = log.created_at.strftime('%Y')
        
      552. 
      
        
    552. 
          
          
          				data_with_time[year] = data_with_time[year] + log.counter
        
      553. 
      
        
    553. 
          
          
          			end
        
      554. 
      
        
    554. 
          
          
          		end
        
      555. 
      
        
    555. 
          
          
          
        
      556. 
      
        
    556. 
          6
          
          		data_to_return = []
        
      557. 
      
        
    557. 
          
          
          
        
      558. 
      
        
    558. 
          6
          
          		data_with_time.each do |time, data|
        
      559. 
      
        
    559. 
          192
          
          			data_to_return << data
        
      560. 
      
        
    560. 
          
          
          		end
        
      561. 
      
        
    561. 
          
          
          
        
      562. 
      
        
    562. 
          6
          
          		data_to_return
        
      563. 
      
        
    563. 
          
          
          	end
        
      564.

          	def get_all_data(all_uni_modules, all_users, all_tags, department, time_period)

          2

      648.

    app/helpers/application_helper.rb

    40.13 % covered

          	def sort_by(results_array, sort_by_category)
        
      26. 
      
        
    26. 
          
          
          	    if(results_array.is_a?(Array))
        
      27. 
      
        
    27. 
          
          
          	      results_array = Array(results_array)
        
      28. 
      
        
    28. 
          
          
          	    end
        
      29. 
      
        
    29. 
          
          
          
        
      30. 
      
        
    30. 
          
          
          	    if results_array.empty? || sort_by_category == ""
        
      31. 
      
        
    31. 
          
          
          	      return results_array
        
      32. 
      
        
    32. 
          
          
          	    end
        
      33. 
      
        
    33. 
          
          
          
        
      34. 
      
        
    34. 
          
          
          	    modules_with_weightings = []
        
      35. 
      
        
    35. 
          
          
          	    modules_with_no_weightings = []
        
      36. 
      
        
    36. 
          
          
          	    modules_with_pass_rate = []
        
      37. 
      
        
    37. 
          
          
          	    modules_with_no_pass_rate = []
        
      38. 
      
        
    38. 
          
          
                modules_with_ratings = []
        
      39. 
      
        
    39. 
          
          
                modules_with_no_ratings = []
        
      40. 
      
        
    40. 
          
          
          
        
      41. 
      
        
    41. 
          
          
          	    results_array.each do |result|
        
      42. 
      
        
    42. 
          
          
          	      uni_module = result[0]
        
      43. 
      
        
    43. 
          
          
          	      # if module has exam + coursework percentage that are not nil, then store in array for weightings
        
      44. 
      
        
    44. 
          
          
          	      if uni_module.exam_percentage && uni_module.coursework_percentage
        
      45. 
      
        
    45. 
          
          
          	        modules_with_weightings << result
        
      46. 
      
        
    46. 
          
          
          	      else
        
      47. 
      
        
    47. 
          
          
          	        modules_with_no_weightings << result
        
      48. 
      
        
    48. 
          
          
          	      end
        
      49. 
      
        
    49. 
          
          
          
        
      50. 
      
        
    50. 
          
          
          	      # if module has pass rate that is not nil, then store in array for pass rate
        
      51. 
      
        
    51. 
          
          
          	      if uni_module.pass_rate
        
      52. 
      
        
    52. 
          
          
          	        modules_with_pass_rate << result
        
      53. 
      
        
    53. 
          
          
          	      else
        
      54. 
      
        
    54. 
          
          
          	        modules_with_no_pass_rate << result
        
      55. 
      
        
    55. 
          
          
          	      end
        
      56. 
      
        
    56. 
          
          
          
        
      57. 
      
        
    57. 
          
          
                  # if a module has a rating that is not 0, then store in array for ratings
        
      58. 
      
        
    58. 
          
          
                  if module_average_rating(uni_module) != 0
        
      59. 
      
        
    59. 
          
          
                    modules_with_ratings << result
        
      60. 
      
        
    60. 
          
          
                  else
        
      61. 
      
        
    61. 
          
          
                    modules_with_no_ratings << result
        
      62. 
      
        
    62. 
          
          
                  end
        
      63. 
      
        
    63. 
          
          
          	    end
        
      64. 
      
        
    64. 
          
          
          
        
      65. 
      
        
    65. 
          
          
          	    if sort_by_category == "coursework"
        
      66. 
      
        
    66. 
          
          
          	      # sorted results according to coursework percentage
        
      67. 
      
        
    67. 
          
          
          	      results_with_attribute = modules_with_weightings.sort_by { |result| [result[0].coursework_percentage, result[1].size] }
        
      68. 
      
        
    68. 
          
          
          	      # sort the remaining modules (without the exam/coursework attribute) according to number of tags matched
        
      69. 
      
        
    69. 
          
          
          	      results_without_attribute = modules_with_no_weightings.sort_by {|result| result[1].size}
        
      70. 
      
        
    70. 
          
          
          	      return (results_without_attribute.concat results_with_attribute).reverse
        
      71. 
      
        
    71. 
          
          
          	    elsif sort_by_category == "exam"
        
      72. 
      
        
    72. 
          
          
          	      # sorted results according to exam percentage
        
      73. 
      
        
    73. 
          
          
          	      results_with_attribute = modules_with_weightings.sort_by { |result| [result[0].exam_percentage, result[1].size] }
        
      74. 
      
        
    74. 
          
          
          	      # sort the remaining modules (without the exam/coursework attribute) according to number of tags matched
        
      75. 
      
        
    75. 
          
          
          	      results_without_attribute = modules_with_no_weightings.sort_by {|result| result[1].size}
        
      76. 
      
        
    76. 
          
          
          	      return (results_without_attribute.concat results_with_attribute).reverse
        
      77. 
      
        
    77. 
          
          
          	    elsif sort_by_category == "pass"
        
      78. 
      
        
    78. 
          
          
          	      # sorted results according to pass rate
        
      79. 
      
        
    79.

      80. 
      
        
    80. 
          
          
          	      # sort the remaining modules (without the pass rate attribute) according to number of tags matched
        
      81. 
      
        
    81.

      82. 
      
        
    82. 
          
          
          	      return (results_without_attribute.concat results_with_attribute).reverse
        
      83. 
      
        
    83. 
          
          
          	    elsif sort_by_category == "rating"
        
      84. 
      
        
    84. 
          
          
                  # sort the results by their average rating
        
      85. 
      
        
    85. 
          
          
                  results_with_attribute = modules_with_ratings.sort_by {|result| [module_average_rating(result[0]), result[1].size] }
        
      86. 
      
        
    86. 
          
          
                  # sort the remaining modules (with rating 0) according to number of tags matched
        
      87. 
      
        
    87. 
          
          
          	     	results_without_attribute = modules_with_no_ratings.sort_by {|result| result[1].size}
        
      88. 
      
        
    88. 
          
          
                  return (results_without_attribute.concat results_with_attribute).reverse
        
      89. 
      
        
    89. 
          
          
          	    end
        
      90.

      91.

      93.

              def sort_pathways(user, ways)
        
      99. 
      
        
    99. 
          
          
                user_pathways = Array(user.pathways)
        
      100. 
      
        
    100. 
          
          
                result = []
        
      101. 
      
        
    101. 
          
          
          
        
      102. 
      
        
    102. 
          
          
                if ways == "name"
        
      103. 
      
        
    103.

      104. 
      
        
    104. 
          
          
                elsif ways == "date_created"
        
      105. 
      
        
    105. 
          
          
                  result = user_pathways.sort_by { |pathway| pathway.created_at }.reverse
        
      106. 
      
        
    106. 
          
          
                end
        
      107. 
      
        
    107. 
          
          
          
        
      108.

          	def is_admin

      155.

            def check_user_level(id,user_level_to_check)
        
      163. 
      
        
    163. 
          
          
              user = User.find(id)
        
      164. 
      
        
    164. 
          
          
              (user_level_to_check == User.user_levels[user.user_level]) # Returns the integer value
        
      165. 
      
        
    165. 
          
          
            end

            # Specifies the allowed attributes to show on the user's show page
        
      168. 
      
        
    168. 
          1
          
            def filter_for_user_show(attribute)
        
      169. 
      
        
    169. 
          
          
              user_level = User.user_levels[User.find(params[:id]).user_level]
        
      170. 
      
        
    170. 
          
          
              # super admin's attributes not to show
        
      171. 
      
        
    171. 
          
          
              super_admin_filter = user_level == 1 && attribute != "course" &&
        
      172. 
      
        
    172. 
          
          
                  attribute != "year_of_study" && attribute != "faculty" && attribute != "departments"
        
      173. 
      
        
    173. 
          
          
              # department admin's attributes not to show
        
      174. 
      
        
    174. 
          
          
              department_admin_filter = user_level == 2 && attribute != "course" &&
        
      175. 
      
        
    175. 
          
          
                  attribute != "year_of_study"
        
      176. 
      
        
    176. 
          
          
              # user's attributes not to show
        
      177. 
      
        
    177. 
          
          
              user_filter = user_level == 3
        
      178. 
      
        
    178. 
          
          
              super_admin_filter || department_admin_filter || user_filter
        
      179. 
      
        
    179. 
          
          
          	end
        
      180. 
      
        
    180. 
          
          
          
        
      181. 
      
        
    181.

    182.

            end

            def make_semester_nice(semester_number)
        
      190. 
      
        
    190. 
          4
          
          	if semester_number == "No data available"
        
      191. 
      
        
    191. 
          
          
          	  "No data available"
        
      192. 
      
        
    192. 
          4
          
          	elsif semester_number == "0"
        
      193. 
      
        
    193. 
          
          
          	  "1 or 2"
        
      194. 
      
        
    194. 
          4
          
          	elsif semester_number == "1"
        
      195. 
      
        
    195. 
          3
          
          	  "1"
        
      196. 
      
        
    196. 
          1
          
          	elsif semester_number == "2"
        
      197. 
      
        
    197. 
          1
          
          	  "2"
        
      198. 
      
        
    198. 
          
          
          	else
        
      199.

          	def generate_linked_attribute(path,object,attribute)
        
      207. 
      
        
    207. 
          
          
          		collection = object.send(attribute)
        
      208. 
      
        
    208. 
          
          
          		if collection.present?
        
      209. 
      
        
    209. 
          
          
          			return link_to object.send(attribute).name.to_s,path
        
      210. 
      
        
    210. 
          
          
          		end
        
      211. 
      
        
    211. 
          
          
          		"-"
        
      212. 
      
        
    212. 
          
          
          	end

          	# returns the name of a association given the object and attribute
        
      215. 
      
        
    215. 
          1
          
          	def find_name_of_association(object,attribute)
        
      216. 
      
        
    216. 
          104
          
          		begin
        
      217. 
      
        
    217. 
          104
          
          			object.send(attribute).name
        
      218. 
      
        
    218. 
          
          
          		rescue
        
      219. 
      
        
    219. 
          97
          
          			""
        
      220. 
      
        
    220. 
          
          
          		end
        
      221. 
      
        
    221. 
          
          
            end
